SEARCH
Package main.services

Class ProjectService

java.lang.Object
main.services.ProjectService
public class ProjectService extends Object
Handles logic related to loading, managing, and retrieving BTO projects. Also links projects to applicants and managers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ProjectService(FileManager fileManager, ApplicantService applicantSvc)
    Constructs a ProjectService and loads projects from file.
